topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats :: XML

name: ExcelToXmlSamples

screenshots.caption: Running the tool from the command-line.

short_description: The ExcelToXmlSamples library (written in C#) makes it easy to create XML sample files from Excel sheets. It takes an Excel workbook (.xlsx) as input and generates one or more XML samples based on data in the sheets. ExcelToXmlSamples currently consists of a Class Library project (.dll) and a Console Application project, to call the library. A Windows Forms Application project may be added later. The project relies on the SharpZipLib for extracting files from the Excel workbook: http://www.icsharpcode.net/opensource/sharpziplib/
